item.description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang plans to visit China ahead of the mid-February Lunar New Year, two people familiar with the matter told CNBC.

item.title: Alibaba-backed startup Moonshot AI's valuation is up $500 million, sources say, after its rivals IPO in Hong Kong
item.description: Investors are valuing the startup at $4.8 billion as it is about to close another funding round, according to two people familiar with the matter.
